alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 15 at 3:29AM EST until November 16 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected up to 2.5 feet. * WHERE...Coastal Jefferson and Coastal Wakulla Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to 7 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Minor coastal flooding is possible. Up to 2.5 feet of inundation is possible on normally dry ground near the shoreline. The high tide of greatest concern will come late tonight.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
